question: 装置
sourceMnemonic: This <kanji>attire</kanji> is <kanji>put</kanji> inside this <vocabulary>equipment</vocabulary>, where it's changed into something else. This attire <vocabulary>device</vocabulary> is strange and interesting. Imagine something that it does to your attire.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
